general.firstNameInvalid: Please provide a firstname. Only letters are allowed.

alerts.savingSuccess: Dataset saved successfully. The XML file download will start automatically.

resourceInfo.title: Resource Information
resourceInfo.doiValid: A new DOI will be registered
resourceInfo.doiInvalid: Please use format 10.ORGANISATION/ID (i.e.: 10.57757/IUGG23-3081) or leave empty
resourceInfo.publicationYearInvalid: Please provide a valid year ranging from 1901-2155 (4 digits).
resourceInfo.resourceTitleInvalid: Please provide a descriptive title (that does not repeat the paper title, but describes the data)

contactPersons.title: Contact Person(s)
contactPersons.emailInvalid: Please provide a valid email address in the format xxx.xxx@xxx.xxx.

contributors.organizationInvalid: Please enter a valid organization name.

buttons.saveAsTooltip: Save the current data or content under a new file name.
buttons.submitTooltip: Transmit the entered data or content.

feedback.label: User Feedback
feedback.question1: Which functions of the new metadata editor do you find particularly helpful?
feedback.question2: Is there a particular design or user interface change that you like?
feedback.question3: What do you find positive about the usability of the new editor?
feedback.question4: Which functions of the new editor do you find difficult to use?
feedback.question5: Are there any aspects of the user interface that you find confusing or annoying?
feedback.question6: Do you miss certain functions in the new metadata editor?
feedback.question7: Is there a specific improvement you would like to see?

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.aboutText: The ELMO Metadata Editor was developed in 2024 by students of the University of Applied Sciences Potsdam in cooperation with the German Research Centre for Geosciences and is released under the GNU General Public License, Version 2.
changelog.aboutHeading: About ELMO - Enhanced Laboratory Metadata Organizer
